name: Reflections ~Dreams and Reality~
description: A visual novel about a girl who wishes to escape her fate and those who follow closely behind her. Features both GxB and GxG routes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1920 x 1080 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
